attributes.action: Do not ban students who fail maths or English GCSE from receiving student loans
attributes.additional_details: Banning students who did not pass GCSE English and Maths from receiving a student loan, will only discourage many from even trying to get into higher education. This is not what education is about, education should be accessible to all.
attributes.background: Students from disadvantaged background will be hit the hardest if this rule was to come into play. Higher education already has a huge class divide, and this will only further fuel it. We should be encouraging students to reach their goals, not limiting opportunities

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609369
